title: Rules for Social Media, Created by Kids
cleaned_text: The challenge of growing up in the digital age is perfectly epitomized by the bikini rule. "You can post a bikini or bathing suit picture only if you are with your siblings or your family in the picture," said one middle-school girl who was participating in a focus group on digital media.
